All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Application
Main class for the application
Database
The Database class represents a connection to the database and provides methods for executing queries and retrieving data.
DatabaseController
Responsible for handling HTTP requests related to the database operations.
HelloController
This class represents a controller that handles requests for the root URL ("/").
Ingredient
Represents an ingredient used in a recipe or dish.
Item
The `Item` class represents an item in a menu or inventory.
Order
Represents an order in the system.
Role
The Role class represents a user role in the system.
User
The `User` class represents a user in the system and extends the `UserInfo` class.
UserInfo
Represents user information.
WorkLog
The WorkLog class represents a work log entry for an employee.
